title: Video: The Run Up episode 2 – La Course
content:
Video: The Run Up episode 2 - La Course

The Run Up series that began at Liège-Bastogne-Liège continues at La Course by the Tour de France.

In the second episode, Liv Racing and Trek-Segafredo prepare to race from Brest to Landerneau, a 107 km course that finishes atop the Côte de la Fosse aux Loups.

Lizzie Deignan, the winner of the 2020 edition of La Course, opens up about winning the iconic French one day and her life at home with her daughter.

All the riders look forward to the highly anticipated Tour de France Femmes avec Zwift, especially local legend Audrey Cordon-Ragot.

Read More
author: Abby Mickey
